description:
This trail is a nice ride loaded with drops skinnys and ride offs and the ocasional step up. There is also a slalom track near top mostly downhill.
Includes terrain for Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced and Freeride/Stunts.
Click here to see a map of the trails.
This trail is right beside:
directions:
Along Riverside Drive to citys industrial landfil, You drive up the hill and ride into the forest to find trails and the platforms.
Or: Gatez Avenue to 77 Avenue, turn East, look for access in about 500m.  if you get to 47 Avenue Close, you've gone too far.
title: Red Deer Mountain Bike Park
